author: Special Correspondent
text:
Employees of Puducherry Housing Board on Tuesday staged sit-in inside their office demanding payment of salaries.

Over 80 employees are working in the board as superintendents, assistants and engineers. They were not paid salaries for last four months.

G.Arjunan, president of Puducherry Housing Board Staff Association said, “The families of the employees were severely affected as they did not get salaries for four months. We have represented to several forums but in vain.”

They also warned of intensifying the stir unless the authorities come forward to settle their salary dues.
title: Employees of housing board stage dharna
